title: Gateway to charm
brief_description: the tourist attractions of the north coast of Tasmania. The towns of Wynyard, Burnie, Stanley, Penguin, Ulverston and Devonport are shown, with their beaches, ocean and fresh-water fishing, sporting and camping facilities, and natural scenic attractions. The beauties of the rocky coast are displayed. Aboriginal rock paintings, fossils and the ruins of pioneer settlements can also be seen.
